# ignition_user_source (Data Source)

Reads a User Source from Ignition.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the user source.

### Read-Only

- `failover_mode` (String) The failover mode.
- `failover_profile` (String) The failover profile name.
- `schedule_restricted` (Boolean) Whether the user source is schedule restricted.
- `type` (String) The type of the user source profile.
